plain-text-property: * Command Central Security Roles* DO NOT MODIFY PERMISSIONS SECTION[permissions]permission:allow=canwrite,canexecute,canread,jmx* Available permissions:* canread â?? can view everything* canwrite â?? can create, update, delete anything* canexecute - can execute lifecycle and administration operations (e.g., start)* jmx:com.softwareag:passman:canexecute:* - can retrieve passwords** To remove a role or assignment, delete the line.[roles]* Define one role per line. To specify all permissions, use *.* role:<role_name>=<permission>,<permission>[<permission>...]* superadmin role has full controlrole:superadmin=** operator role can view everything and execute operations, but cannot edit anythingrole:operator=canread,canexecute* viewer role has readonly access to everythingrole:viewer=canreadrole:passman=jmx:com.softwareag:passman:canexecute:*[groups]* Group names are case sensitive.** Assign one or more roles to one internal group per line. * group:"<group_name>"=<role>,<role>[<role>...]* Examples* group:"Operators"=operator* group:"Developers"=viewer* Administrators group has full controlgroup:"Administrators"=superadmin,passman[users]* Assign one or more roles to one internal user per line. * user:"<user_name>"=<role>,<role>[<role>...]
